title: BUG: Mobile mail notifications show pulsing audio icon but no sound plays
description:
On desktop, mail notifications automatically start playing sound. On mobile, the audio icon pulses but no audio plays.

Expected: Audio should auto-play on mobile like it does on desktop
Actual: Audio icon pulses but no sound

Platform: Mobile (iOS/Android TBD)
close_reason: Fixed iPad detection for mobile audio. Modern iPads report as Macintosh in UA, now detected via maxTouchPoints > 1. Pushed to main.

title: Add crew messaging and notifications
description:
Add the ability to send messages to and receive notifications from any crew members in the adjutant dashboard.

Features needed:
- Send messages to crew members (polecats, witnesses, refineries)
- Receive notifications when crew members send messages
- Display crew member messages in the notification system

Related: Builds on existing mail/notification infrastructure.
